page.title: 05GAMES IN BUCKLAND BREWER
page.content:
THERE ARE ABOUT FIFTY-TWO DIFFERENT GAMES PLAYED IN THE SCHOOL PLAYGROUND. THERE ARE MORE CHASING SORTS OF GAMES THAN THE REST. I WOULD SAY THAT THE LITTLE ONES PLAYED MOST OF THE{ACTING}AND{CHASING GAMES.THE OLDER ONES PLAY THE{THROWING AND{DODGING}GAMES MORE THAN THE LITTLE ONES. THE{JUMPING,SKIPPING}AND{RACING GAMES ARE PLAYED BY MORE OR LESS EVERY ONE.
{STUCK IN THE MUD THIS IS A VERY EASY GAME TO PLAY ONCE YOU HAVE GOT THE HANG OF IT. ALL YOU HAVE TO DO IS RUN AROUND .WHEN THE PERSON WHO IS IT HAS COUNTED TO 20 HE RUNS AFTER YOU AND IF YOU ARE CAUGHT YOU HAVE TO STAND WITH YOUR LEGS APART AND YOU HAVE TO WAIT UNTIL
